name: gulp-file-include
description: a gulp plugin for file include
readme:
### gulp-file-include a plugin of gulp for file include ### install ```bash npm install gulp-file-include ``` ### how to use index.html ```html @@include('./view.html') @@include('./var.html', {"name": "haoxin", "age": 12345}) ``` view.html ```html

view

``` var.html ```html ``` gulpfile.js ```js var gulp = require('gulp'), fileinclude = require('gulp-file-include'); gulp.task('fileinclude', function() { gulp.src(['index.html']) .pipe(fileinclude()) .pipe(gulp.dest('./result/')); }); gulp.task('default', function() { gulp.run('fileinclude'); }); ``` and the result is: ```html

view

``` ### License MIT
